summary: Makes Movarth's Boots look like proper Vampire Boots.
descriptionHtml:
Makes Movarth's Boots look like proper Vampire Boots.

While there is an existing mod on the Nexus that does this, it does not seem to work correctly for me (and others). Note that this is a cosmetic change only. Also note that this mod (obviously) requires Dawnguard.


My other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42855/?]Lore-Worthy Bandits[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26450/?]Lore-Worthy Nettlebane[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27385/?]Lore-Worthy Hagravens[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36797/?]Lore-Worthy Quartermasters[/url]
author: Team Value
